panels.visual: HORROR SPLASH: Black sand pours from the now-empty bowl, pooling and rising into a terrible form. A Librarian emerges - a black-winged skeleton with proportions that hurt to perceive, empty eye sockets that somehow see, too many teeth arranged in angles that shouldn't exist. Void-black robes flow like underwater currents. The party recoils in primal terror. This is cosmic horror made manifest - something from OUTSIDE reality.
panels.dialogue: Librarian: "Knowledge seekers. The Library offers power far beyond your wizard councils... for those willing to pay the price."
